Enumeration Type Documentation

enum KviTimeUtils::FormatTimeSpanFlags

Enumerator:
NoLeadingEmptyIntervals  Causes the leading empty intervals to be omitted
NoLeadingZeroes  No leading zeroes are printed in hours and seconds
FillWithHypens  Uses only -- d -- h -- etc.. discards all other flags
